metatags.author: Maegan Vazquez,Geneva Sands
metatags.og:title: Trump denies tear gas was used on child migrants despite pictures, video | CNN Politics
metatags.og:description: President Donald Trump on Monday denied that federal agents along the US-Mexico border used tear gas on child migrants, but photos and videos show women and children migrants were among those caught up in an incident between border agents and a migrant group that rushed a border crossing Sunday.
